## IMemPool.malloc() method

Attempts to allocate a new memory block of given `size` (in bytes). Returns block address or zero if unsuccessful (insufficient memory).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
malloc(size: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  size | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`
